rooms.name: EastJohnStreet
rooms.description: You are on john street, outside the ISR

rooms.name: ISRFrontDesk
rooms.description: You are in the west entry of ISR.  You can see the elevator, the ACM office, and hallways to the north and east.

rooms.name: ISRWardall
rooms.description: You are in the ACM office.  There are lots of friendly ACM people.

rooms.name: ISRLobby
rooms.description: You are in the north hallway.  You can see Siebel 1112 and the door toward NCSA.
